Text: Thank you to those seeding. Remember to come back here to leave feedback. I currently have uploaded 25GB.
Thanks for this, but it would be better if you split it, like each 100 chapter in one rar .. so we don't have to download it all to check the quality or something like that :)
I can do that. It probably would make me feel better having a rounded number for parts. Expect that in a few hours.
